# atomic-result-date-value



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                              | Type     | Default      |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ------------ |
| `field`  | `field`   | The result field which the component should use. This will look for the field in the Result object first, and then in the Result.raw object. It is important to include the necessary field in the ResultList component. | `string` | `'date'`     |
| `format` | `format`  | Available formats: https://day.js.org/docs/en/display/format                                                                                                                                                             | `string` | `'D/M/YYYY'` |
